name: Defend The Kingdom
description:
“Defend The Kingdom” is a side scrolling adventure game being developed by “Vicious Gecko Games”, and is being targeted towards 13-25 year old casual gamers. The game is set in a fantasy world and follows the protagonist “Korvex”, a mighty Battle-Mage, who must rid the kingdom of monsters and beasts attacking from within the realm. Unlike normal side scroller games where the goal may be to beat the level quickly or put a focus into intense perfect movement control by the player, in “Defend The Kingdom” the player’s goal is to defeat every enemy present. As this is the goal of the player, the game will be designed to put a focus into thinking outside of the box on how to defeat all enemies present. 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DefendTheKingdomVGG/
